text: The Rose of Stamboul (German:Die Rose von Stambul) may refer to: * The Rose of Stamboul (operetta), a 1916 operetta by Leo Fall * The Rose of Stamboul (1919 film), a silent German film * The Rose of Stamboul (1953 film), a 1953 West German film adaptation directed by Karl Anton
title: The Rose of Stamboul
